RegPhrase: By clicking the Register button, you agree to the MenuOnGo Terms and Conditions of Use. To learn more about how MenuOnGo collects, uses, shares and protects your personal data, please read the MenuOnGo Privacy Policy.
yourInfosHead: You can view your information below.
logoHead: You can upload your logo below.
logoHead2: The MenuOnGo logo will appear unless you upload a logo.
name: Name
logoInfoP:
Even if your new logo does not appear on this page after installation, please check it from the QR Menu page. It may not appear on this page immediately due to caching.

QR If you would like us to add a background image to your Menu, send us your high-resolution photo of the place via e-mail. Send background photo.
productsP:
You Can Add, Edit and Delete on this page

Just touch / click on the field you want to edit
To add a product Fill in the information from the top line and press the green button next to it and you're done

Click on the sample image to add a product image, crop it the way you want it to appear and save it.

You can specify the currency in which you are selling from the sidebar section.
currencyP: You can choose the currency you want to sell your products in. By default, TL (₺) is set.
cropErrMsg: Your browser does not support the HTML5 canvas element.
delAlertMsg: This item will be permanently deleted from your menu! Of course you can add it later :)
productOrderScsMsg: The product ranking has been successfully updated.
productAddScsMsg: The new product has been successfully added to your menu.
productAddErrMsg: Please fill in all required fields. (The description part is optional.)
productUpdScsMsg: The product has been successfully updated.
productUpdWrnMsg: You did not make any changes.
productDelScsMsg: The product you selected has been deleted from your menu.
catOrderP:
On this page, you can set the order in which the product categories in your menu will be displayed to your customers.
appearance of your QR Menu will be updated as soon as you drag and drop it over the category you want to change its order.
catOrderScsMsg: Category ranking has been successfully updated.
qrUrl: Web URL of your QR Code Menu:
qrPWarning: Your Package Order Feature is not active, please contact us.
pQrUrl: Web URL of your QR Code Menu for Package Order:
minOrderMsg: Set the Discount Rate and Minimum Cart Amount You Want to Apply to the Orders Placed on the MenuOnGo QR Menu:
saleMsg: Your Discount / Minimum Package Settings Have Been Updated
themeP:
Choose Theme For Your QR Code Menu:

By default, the menu without product image will appear. You can use other themes if you wish. The changes you make will be instantly visible in your menu.

You can set your theme color from the tool on the right.
themeColorP: You can determine the primary color to be used in your QR Menu, in accordance with your company identity, using the color palette below.
imWarnMsg: We immediately reviewed your products, but we saw that you did not upload images for all products. If you use this theme without uploading all product images, a standard image will appear for products that you have not uploaded images for.
smimP:
If you want to use a product image but don't want to highlight it too much, this theme is very suitable for your business.

You can view it by clicking on the image below.
bgimP:
We have a small number of products and if you want to show our customers the contents of our products with big pictures, your theme is here.

You can view it by clicking on the image below.
listP:
Suitable for MenuOnGo users who want a simple, stylish qr menu and don't want to go through the hassle of taking/uploading pictures.

You can view it by clicking on the image below.
darksmimP: If you want to use a product image but do not want to highlight it too much, if you want to use a dark theme, this theme is very suitable for your business.
darkbgimP: We have a small number of products and if you want to show our customers the contents of our products with big pictures, your theme is here. You can view it by clicking the image below.
darklistP: Suitable for MenuOnGo users who want a simple, stylish dark qr menu and don't want the hassle of taking/uploading pictures.
subAddWarn: The sub product definition cannot be displayed because it is related to the package order. Please contact us to activate the package order feature.
subAddCardContent:
can define the sub-contents of your products on this page.

Sub-products can be the default content of your regular products or the content that can be added extra.

Later, you can assign sub-products to each product separately from the 'Assign Sub-Products' page.
subAddSmallMsg: Type the sub product name and price and click save
subProdDelWarnMsg: This product will be removed from your sub-items list! Of course you can add it later :)
subProdAssWarn: The sub product assignment cannot be displayed because it is related to the package order. Please contact us to activate the package order feature.
defMatP:
You can define optional sub-products (materials) for the products you want below.
For example, products such as pickles, lettuce, cheddar cheese may be optional for the burger product, and some customers may want to remove them.
choopP:
You can add mandatory sub-products to the products you want below.
For example, for the Burger menu, a beverage may be a mandatory choice and customers choose from Cola, Fanta, Sprite.
choopP2:
You can add products that can be added to the products you want below.
For example, products such as additional pickles, additional hot sauce, additional cheddar cheese may be extra for the Burger product and some customers may want to add them.
subProdAssScsMsg: The sub-products you selected have been assigned
mustTypeName: You need to enter a name for the feature!
downHead: You can download our desktop application, where you can track your 'Package Orders', from the links below.
downP: After logging into the program with your e-mail address and password, you can track your orders. Order receipts will automatically come out from the default printer connected to your computer. You can also install the program on the kitchen or barista computers and have the orders go directly to the kitchen.
downNote: Note: The 'Desk Order' Feature will also be integrated into the system in a very short time.
downP2:
Number of monthly package orders:
0.70 ₺ per package order if between 0-500
0.60 ₺ per package order if between 500-100
0.50 ₺ per package order if 1000 and above
autoTranslateP:
Please Note
On this page, you can automatically translate your previously created menu into different languages. Your customers can view the version according to their language preferences from your QR Menu.

Please complete the translation after entering all of your products on the Products You have the right to translate into a maximum of 2 foreign languages. For more automatic translations, please contact us.
langBlankWarn: Please Do Not Leave Source and Target Languages Blank!
translationInProgressText: This process may take some time depending on the service intensity.
translationDbErrText: Please try again later or contact us.
exitedLangReqText: You have menu translation in this target language!
remainLangNone: You are no longer entitled to automatic translation! Please contact us.
autoTranslateSubP:
Please Note
On this page, you can automatically translate your sub-products that you created earlier into different languages. Your customers can view the version according to their language preferences from your QR Menu.

Please enter all of your sub-products on the Add Sub-Products page and then translate. You have the right to translate into a maximum of 2 foreign languages. For more automatic translations, please contact us.
attentionLangText: Do not auto-translate without completing the entry of all your products.
orderTrackMsg: You can track your order from the link below until it arrives at your door.
dearForw: You have successfully completed your order confirmation. We have forwarded your order to the company.
verifiedOrderMailTitle: MenuOnGo Package Order Delivered to Business
orderMailFooterMsg: If you believe this email was sent incorrectly, please contact us.
verifyEmailButton: Click for Order and E-Mail Delivery
verifyEmailText: Click the button below to confirm your order.
sorryForLangEn: Unfortunately we do not have menu translation in your preferred language, so the menu is displayed as English
sameTargetSourceWarn: Target and Source language cannot be the same!
langDiffSelectedText:
The Detected Menu Language and the Source Language You Selected Are Different!
If the source language is selected incorrectly, the translation will be incorrect!
Are you sure?
featMultiLang3: You Can Automatically Translate Your Menu To Different Languages
welcome: Hoşgeldiniz, hesabınıza giriş yaparak menü ve siparişlerinizi yönetmeye başlayabilirsini
